name: Think Tank: Royal Siege
description:
Navigate the maze and capture the King!

This is Royal Siege, the second installment in the Think Tank series. In this game, you play as a pawn; and you're on your way to usurp the throne and overthrow the monarchy!

Controls (pc):

W, A, S, D - Move

E - Select

R - Reset

Enter - Pause

Controls (mobile):

Arrows - Move

A - Select

B - Reset

Enter - Pause

!!!Disclaimer!!!

(We here at Cozy Condo Gaming do NOT condone usurping thrones or overthrowing monarchies!)
